name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
